R code examples for checking IP addresses, managing proxy settings, and testing internet speed.

This document provides a collection of R code examples for network-related tasks. It demonstrates how to check your public IP address using a JSON API, and how to manage proxy settings with the `r.proxy` package, including setting, stopping, and resetting proxies. Additionally, it includes code for testing your internet download and upload speeds using the `speedtest` package, and for making HTTP requests through a proxy with the `httr` package.


查看当前IP地址

# Using R

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
```
:::


## check IP address


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
#pak::pkg_install('ip2location')
library(rjson)
fromJSON(readLines("http://api.hostip.info/get_json.php", warn=F))$ip
```
:::


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
#pak::pkg_install("r.proxy")
r.proxy::check_ip()
```
:::

## set up

#> Please complete below configrations:)
#> Default setting can be accessed by Enter with nothing
#> [socks5 proxy] {Default as 127.0.0.1:7890} (address:port): 192.168.3.15:7890
#> [https proxy] {Default as 127.0.0.1:7890} (address:port): 
#> [http proxy] {Default as 127.0.0.1:7890} (address:port): 


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
r.proxy::proxy()
```
:::
## stop proxy

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
r.proxy::noproxy()
```
:::

## reset 

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
r.proxy::init_proxy()
```
:::


## check internet speed

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
#remotes::install_github("hrbrmstr/speedtest")
library(speedtest)
speedtest::spd_test()
```
:::
::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
config <- spd_config()

servers <- spd_servers(config=config)
closest_servers <- spd_closest_servers(servers, config=config)
only_the_best_severs <- spd_best_servers(closest_servers, config)
```
:::

## download speed
::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
glimpse(spd_download_test(closest_servers[1,], config=config))
```
:::


## upload speed

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
glimpse(spd_upload_test(only_the_best_severs[1,], config=config))
```
:::


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(httr)
GET("http://had.co.nz", use_proxy("64.251.21.73", 8080), verbose())
```
:::
